body_html:
You are asking new_model to compute the gradients of some weights (specifically the weights of the second Conv2D layer) that are not involved in the forward pass of the model. Naturally, these weights have None gradients, which is an error.

Make sure that all layers you are including in your model are used.
body_text:
You are asking new_model to compute the gradients of some weights (specifically the weights of the second Conv2D layer) that are not involved in the forward pass of the model. Naturally, these weights have None gradients, which is an error.
Make sure that all layers you are including in your model are used.
body:
You are asking `new_model` to compute the gradients of some weights (specifically the weights of the second `Conv2D` layer) that are not involved in the forward pass of the model. Naturally, these weights have None gradients, which is an error.

Make sure that all layers you are including in your model are used.
